headline: ServiceNow Reports Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results
summary: SANTA CLARA, Calif., July 23, 2025--ServiceNow (NYSE: NOW), the AI platform for business transformation, today announced financial results for its second quarter ended June 30, 2025, with subscription revenues of $3,113 million in Q2 2025, representing 22.5% year-over-year growth and 21.5% in constant currency.

raw.headline: ServiceNow Reports Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results
raw.summary: SANTA CLARA, Calif., July 23, 2025--ServiceNow (NYSE: NOW), the AI platform for business transformation, today announced financial results for its second quarter ended June 30, 2025, with subscription revenues of $3,113 million in Q2 2025, representing 22.5% year-over-year growth and 21.5% in constant currency.

headline: Data Diode Market Report 2025, with Profiles of Siemens, Cisco Systems, BAE Systems, Thales Group, Singapore Technologies Engineering and More
summary: The data diode market is set to expand from $1.11 billion in 2024 to $2.23 billion in 2029, at a CAGR of 15%. Key growth drivers include rising cybersecurity concerns, Industry 4.0 adoption, and increased IT-OT convergence. North America leads the market, with Asia-Pacific as the fastest-growing region. headline: Marvell Appoints Rajiv Ramaswami to its Board of Directors
summary: Marvell Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ: MRVL), a leader in data infrastructure semiconductor solutions, today announced the appointment of Rajiv Ramaswami, President and Chief Executive Officer of Nutanix, to its Board of Directors, effective July 22, 2025.

raw.headline: Marvell Appoints Rajiv Ramaswami to its Board of Directors
raw.summary: Marvell Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ: MRVL), a leader in data infrastructure semiconductor solutions, today announced the appointment of Rajiv Ramaswami, President and Chief Executive Officer of Nutanix, to its Board of Directors, effective July 22, 2025.

headline: Employees want informal social areas, food to boost collaboration
summary: Most companies requiring in-office work are offering no perks to encourage attendance, leaving opportunities for collaboration on the table, a report by ezCater says.

raw.headline: Employees want informal social areas, food to boost collaboration
raw.summary: Most companies requiring in-office work are offering no perks to encourage attendance, leaving opportunities for collaboration on the table, a report by ezCater says.

headline: What to Expect From Cisco's Next Quarterly Earnings Report
summary: Analysts expect Cisco to post a double-digit profit increase when it reports its second-quarter earnings next month
